name: CounttoMoveforKids
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: In this skill,your kids learn in a fun way. They learn how to count numbers 1-10 and them learn common action like step forward,step back,jump. Just ask alexa whats flash briefing to listen to this count and move for kids skill. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
